text:
e="preserve">Ilse Uyttersprot (10 May 1967 – 4 August 2020) was a Belgian politician. She was a member of the Chamber of Representatives from 2007 to 2010. From 2007 to 2013, she was mayor of Aalst, Belgium.
Uyttersprot was murdered by her boyfriend with a hammer on 4 August 2020 in Aalst, aged 53.
